title: History pagination protocol and pi-socket server handler
summary: Implemented history pagination protocol (FetchHistoryRequest, HistoryPageResponse) in hyper-pi-protocol. Added getHistoryPage() function in pi-socket with correct message slicing, hasMore flag, and oldestIndex metadata. Implemented ws.on('message') handler to detect and route fetch_history JSON requests separately from plain text prompts. Re-exported types. 12 unit tests for getHistoryPage() + 3 message routing tests. All 77 pi-socket tests pass. Ready for task-4 (infinite scroll client) to integrate.
